\caption[Breakdown of uncertainty on background estimates]{
Breakdown of the dominant systematic uncertainties on background estimates in SRJigsawSRC5.
Note that the individual uncertainties can be correlated, and do not necessarily add up quadratically to
the total background uncertainty. The percentages show the size of the uncertainty relative to the total expected background.
When the quoted uncertainty is 0, it means that the relative uncertainty is lower than 5 per mil. When a dash is shown, the resulting relative uncertainty is lower than 1 per mil.\label{tab:BreakdownSysSR}}
